snippet: Erika Andiola took to social media to enlist supporters after immigration agents in Arizona took her mother and brother into custody.
abstract: Immigration agents arrest mother and brother of immigration activist Erika Andiola during raid at her Phoenix home, unleashing vigorous response on social media; family members are detained after routine fingerprinting reveals they are illegally in country; incident focuses new attention on one of most controversial aspects of Obama administration’s policies on deportation.

byline.contributor: Julia Preston contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Erika Andiola took to social media to enlist supporters after immigration agents in Arizona took her mother and brother into custody.

headline.seo: Immigration Arrests Lead to Online Outcry, and Release
headline.main: After Immigration Arrests, Online Outcry, and Release
headline.print_headline: After Immigration Arrests, Online Outcry, and Release
